name: licensee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who has official permission to do something, especially to sell alcoholic drinks

Add to word list
Add to word list
LAW, COMMERCE, IT a person or organization who has official permission to make, do, or own something: No one but a manufacturer or its licensee can legally import a drug into the United States. Compare
licensor
LAW, GOVERNMENT
  UK a person who has official permission to sell alcohol: By law, the licensee of a pub must be a fit and proper person. Compare
licensor
